thread.section_title: The Chess Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great stay
thread.title_full: Great stay - Review of The Chess Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: stewartandreww
title: Great stay
text:
Good sized rooms, very welcoming staff and helpful with information the hotel is modern and the reception are a lovely space to relax. They have a terrace on the first floor where you can smoke or just chill with drinks ( as smokers we found this very useful
Room Tip: You can use a USB so maybe download films or something to watch x See more room tips
